relationships.description: Ron is starting to grow fond of Harry.
Lucius Malfoy has been sacked as a school governor at Hogwarts.
Draco is no longer strutting around the school as he used to.
Ginny Weasley is perfectly happy again.
Fred is playing Exploding Snap with Harry and his friends.
George is playing Exploding Snap with Harry and his friends.
